title: Compare Actual vs. Planned Schedule
description: A project planner is analyzing schedule performance by comparing the actual progress against the original baseline.

tasks.description: Apply a view that shows the current schedule bars alongside the baseline bars.
tasks.expected_outcome: The planner can now visually compare the actual progress to the original plan.

tasks.description: Identify the activities that have the largest negative variance (i.e., are the most delayed) and flag them for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the top 3 delayed activities to be discussed in the next project meeting.
